sentence.Network_en: Umbrellas shade outdoor cafes along winding cobblestone streets.

entry.def: Cobblestones are stones with a rounded upper surface which used to be used for making streets.

means.word_mean: 1. rectangular paving stone with curved top; once used to make roads
